titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012. Modified by Dot Porter in 2017.

bioghist.p: The Japanese Presbyterian Conference is an informal organization of Japanese American Presbyterian churches in the United States. Founded in 1905, the Conference engages in activities such as lobbying the General Assembly, supporting social justice campaigns and education, and sponsoring cultural seminars. The Conference also works with churches and denominational agencies to develop specialized curriculum, liturgy, and programs for the Japanese American community.

scopecontent.p: This is a collection of anniversary booklets for member churches of the Japanese Presbyterian Conference. The collection includes booklets for the Parkview Presbyterian Church, Sacramento, California; the Ogden Japanese Christian Church, Ogden, Utah; the Cortez Presbyterian Church, in Cortez, California; the Calvary Presbyterian Church, Stockton, California; the Union Church of Los Angeles, California; and the Japanese Church of Christ, Salt Lake City, Utah.

accessrestrict.p: Access to this collection is restricted; please contact the holding institution for details.

acqinfo.p: Provenance: Japanese Presbyterian Conference, Sumio Koge
